items.name: Uyo Young Explorers Science Hub
items.short_description: An interactive science center offering hands-on exhibits in physics, biology, and technology, designed to spark curiosity in young minds.
items.address: University of Uyo Annex Campus, Ikpa Road, Uyo, Akwa Ibom State

items.name: Uyo Adventure Land
items.short_description: A vibrant outdoor adventure park featuring climbing structures, zip lines, and themed play zones for kids of all ages to explore.
items.address: Plot 7, Ewet Housing Estate Extension, Uyo, Akwa Ibom State

items.name: Splash Zone Uyo
items.short_description: A refreshing water park designed with thrilling slides, splash pads, and shallow pools for children to beat the heat and have fun.
items.address: Along Airport Road, close to Ibom Tropicana, Uyo, Akwa Ibom State

items.name: Akwa Ibom Children's Zoo
items.short_description: A friendly zoo experience tailored for young visitors, featuring local and exotic animals, plus a popular petting zoo area.
items.address: Near Ikot Ekpene Road, close to Uyo Township Stadium, Uyo, Akwa Ibom State
